content.title: Radiation-Induced Vasculopathy
content.description: Accelerated atherosclerosis and fibrosis affecting arteries within radiation fields, with latency of 5-20+ years.

clinical_features.pathology: Accelerated atherosclerosis, intimal fibrosis, adventitial fibrosis

surgical_challenges.tissue_quality: Poor wound healing, fibrosis, friable vessels
surgical_challenges.approach: May require extra-anatomic bypass or endovascular approach

treatment_considerations.endovascular: Preferred when feasible due to hostile surgical field
treatment_considerations.open: Requires careful planning, tissue coverage considerations

content.clinical_pearl: Tissue planes obliterated; consider muscle flap coverage for groin incisions in irradiated field
